titleStmt.title: Something in answer to a law lately made at the first sessions of the General Court held at Boston in New-England, May the 28th, 1679 : and published by their order, Edw. Rawson, Secretary : the title of the law, viz. Meeting-houses not to be erected without licence, &c.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 18: The 19th of the 7th month, 1679. G.F.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
